medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute-onset left-sided chest pain and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely; duration not specified. The patient presented with myocardial infarction and pulmonary embolism.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of asthma, peripheral cyanosis, and inferior-wall myocardial infarction with occlusion of the right coronary artery 8 months earlier, which required balloon angioplasty.
